content:
Congratulations on completing your EU set!

The European Union has a rich tradition of issuing commemorative coins, and many member states release special coins to celebrate various events, anniversaries, and cultural heritage. Here's an overview of the commemorative coins issued by EU countries in recent years:

**2018:**

* Greece: 2€ coin commemorating the 70th anniversary of the union of the Dodecanese with Greece (the one you just acquired!)
* Austria: 2€ coin celebrating the 100th anniversary of the Republic of Austria
* Belgium: 2€ coin honoring the 50th anniversary of the May 1968 student and worker protests
* France: 2€ coin marking the 100th anniversary of the end of World War I
* Germany: 2€ coin commemorating the 100th anniversary of the birth of Helmut Schmidt, former Chancellor of Germany
* Ireland: 2€ coin celebrating the centenary of the first sitting of the First Dáil Éireann
* Italy: 2€ coin honoring the 70th anniversary of the Italian Constitution
* Luxembourg: 2€ coin marking the 175th anniversary of the independence of Luxembourg
* Portugal: 2€ coin celebrating the 250th anniversary of the Ajuda Botanical Garden
* Slovenia: 2€ coin commemorating the 100th anniversary of the establishment of the University of Ljubljana

**2019:**

* Belgium: 2€ coin honoring the 25th anniversary of the European Monetary Institute
* Estonia: 2€ coin celebrating the 100th anniversary of the University of Tartu
* France: 2€ coin marking the 60th anniversary of the Élysée Treaty
* Germany: 2€ coin commemorating the 30th anniversary of the fall of the Berlin Wall
* Greece: 2€ coin celebrating the 150th anniversary of the death of Andreas Kalvos
* Ireland: 2€ coin honoring the 100th anniversary of the first transatlantic flight
* Italy: 2€ coin marking the 500th anniversary of the death of Leonardo da Vinci
* Lithuania: 2€ coin commemorating the 100th anniversary of the Act of Independence of Lithuania
* Luxembourg: 2€ coin celebrating the 100th anniversary of the accession to the throne of Grand Duchess Charlotte
* Portugal: 2€ coin honoring the 500th anniversary of the circumnavigation of the globe by Ferdinand Magellan
* Slovakia: 2€ coin commemorating the 100th anniversary of the death of Milan Rastislav Štefánik
* Slovenia: 2€ coin celebrating the 100th anniversary of the establishment of the University of Ljubljana

**2020:**

* Austria: 2€ coin commemorating the 100th anniversary of the Austrian Federal Constitution
* Belgium: 2€ coin honoring the International Year of Plant Health
* Estonia: 2€ coin celebrating the 200th anniversary of the founding of the University of Tartu
* France: 2€ coin marking the 50th anniversary of the death of Charles de Gaulle
* Germany: 2€ coin commemorating the 50th anniversary of the Brandt's Eastern Policy
* Greece: 2€ coin celebrating the 2500th anniversary of the Battle of Thermopylae
* Ireland: 2€ coin honoring the 100th anniversary of the Government of Ireland Act
* Italy: 2€ coin marking the 150th anniversary of the birth of Maria Montessori
* Luxembourg: 2€ coin celebrating the 100th anniversary of the Grand Ducal Guard
* Portugal: 2€ coin commemorating the 730th anniversary of the University of Coimbra
* Slovakia: 2€ coin honoring the 20th anniversary of the accession to
